summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pocket Guru spiritual guidance AI assistant. Backend functionality is fully working (100% success rate). Frontend core user flow works excellently with minor UI interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Browser sessions occasionally reset to welcome page during testing
Click interactions blocked by modal overlays in admin dashboard

passed_tests: Welcome page loads with all elements
Complete 3-step onboarding flow (alignment, deity, goal selection)
User onboarding completion and navigation to chat
Chat page loads with WhatsApp-style interface
Admin dashboard loads and displays data correctly
Admin navigation and back button functionality
